SEARCH
Package com.fabo.fractionlesson.domain

Class Fraction

java.lang.Object
com.fabo.fractionlesson.domain.Fraction
public class Fraction extends Object
This class defines a math problem the constructor sets the function(Add, Sub, Mul, Div). The constructor takes a Numerator and a Denominator. The class also times from the last getNumerator to the answer entered.

    • lessThan

      public boolean lessThan(Fraction frac)
      Is the input Fraction less than this Fraction. Find the Least Common Denominator(LCD). Multiply each numerator by the LCD. return true if the normalized numerator of the input fraction is less than the normalized numerator of this Fraction.
      Parameters:
      frac - - a Fraction object to compare with this Fraction object
      Returns:
      - if the input fraction is less that this Fraction.

    • greaterThan

      public boolean greaterThan(Fraction frac)
      Is the input Fraction greater than this Fraction. Find the Least Common Denominator(LCD). Multiply each numerator by the LCD. return true if the normalized numerator of the input fraction is greater than the normalized numerator of this Fraction.
      Parameters:
      frac - - a Fraction object to compare with this Fraction object
      Returns:
      - if the input fraction is greater that this Fraction.
